page.title: 09Tourism
page.content: Tayport is growing in popularity as a holiday resort. There is a large {caravan park and camping site}with sandy beaches close by. There is a{nature reserve,}a bird sanctuary,and the nature trails. There is an 18 hole{golf course}and easy access to St andrews the home of golf.There is a good shopping centre in nearby Dundee.There are{tennis {courts,and a bowling green.A}childrens {carnival}on the common playing fields. There is a{boating pond}on the common and a small{paddling pool}for toddlers. Tayport is very small but is very good for holiday makers Tayports population is bigger in the summer because of the many holiday makers that come.The majority of holiday makers are scots and few English.
